title: Jamaican Cornmeal Porridge
method: Step 1: Combine water, cornmeal, whole milk, coconut milk, white sugar, vanilla extract, salt, nutmeg, and cinnamon in a blender; blend until smooth. Transfer to a saucepan.

Step 2: Bring cornmeal mixture to a boil, whisking occasionally, until it begins to thicken, about 5 minutes. Reduce heat when slow bubbles form; continue cooking, stirring frequently, until desired thickness, about 5 minutes. Stir in raisins.
Step 3: Remove from heat, cover, and cool slightly before serving, about 5 minutes.
Step 4: You may also blend cornmeal mixture in a NutriBullet or shake well in a sealed container.
